package.description: Configuration for automatically packaging and publishing this mod [FMTK]

ignore.description: Globs to ignore when building zip package

extra.description: Directories containing extra files to include in the zip package

root.description: Directory containing extra files to include in the zip package

glob.description: Glob for matching files to include from this directory

ignore.description: Globs to ignore in this root

readme.description: Markdown file to be uploaded to the portal as long description

faq.description: Markdown file to be uploaded to the portal as faq

markdown.description: Options for transforming markdown files uploaded to the portal

base_url.description: Base url for `url` rewrites. If not set, links will not be rewritten.

url_match.description: Urls matching this regex will *not* be rewritten

git_publish_branch.description: Name of branch to Publish from. Defaults to the value of `git config init.defaultBranch` if not present. Set `null` to allow any branch.

no_portal_upload.description: Don't automatically upload to the mod portal in Publish

sync_portal_details.description: Automatically update mod details and gallery in Publish

scripts.description: Additional scripts to run while packaging/publishing mods

additionalProperties.description: Additional scripts to run with `fmtk run name`

prepublish.description: Command to run while preparing the pre-publish commit. Files added to git during this command will be included in that commit.

datestamp.description: Command to run after datestamping the changelog.

prepackage.description: Command to run while preparing the zip package. Files created/changed during this command will be included in the zip.

version.description: Command to run after incrementing the version.

publish.description: Command to run while preparing the post-publish commit, after incrementing the version. Files added to git during this command will be included in that commit.

postpublish.description: Command to run after automatic uploads.
